Title: Fire and Reign
Writer: Brad Falchuk (created by), Ryan Murphy (created by)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Adina Porter, Billie Lourd
Plot: As Michael puts a spell on Cordelia he continues toward world annihilation, starting with the witches and warlocks. Queenie and Zoe look for answers with the Voodoo Queen. Madison takes an unexpected trip to an old friend's house.
